src:
Osrednji del BiH stresel močan potres
02 Nov 2019, 16:59 by STA

Osrednji del Bosne in Hercegovine je danes stresel močan potres z magnitudo 5,1, ki so ga čutili po vsej državi. Tla so se zatresla ob 15.13, žarišče je bilo 85 kilometrov severozahodno od Sarajeva oziroma 14 kilometrov od kraja Turbet blizu Travnika v globini pet kilometrov.



Foto: STA

SARAJEVO > Podatkov o morebitni škodi ali žrtvah ni. Prebivalci več mest so poročali o tresenju poslopij, ki je trajalo nekaj sekund.
Zadnji tako močan potres so nazadnje v BiH zabeležili leta 2012 v Zenici, ko je dosegel magnitudo 4,9, poroča portal klix.ba.
Potres so čutili tudi v velikem delu sosednje Hrvaške od Slavonskega Broda, Vinkovcev do Karlovca ter vse do Dubrovnika, so sporočili iz hrvaške seizmološke službe. Podatkov o morebitni škodi ni, poroča hrvaška tiskovna agencija Hina.
text:
The central part of BiH was shaken by a strong earthquake
02 Nov 2019, 15:59 by STA

The central part of Bosnia and Herzegovina has today been shaken by the massive 5.1 magnitude earthquake felt across the country. The ground shook at 3:13 pm, the focal point was 85 kilometers northwest of Sarajevo, or 14 kilometers from Turbet near Travnik at a depth of five kilometers.



Photo: STA

SARAJEVO> There is no information on any damage or casualties. Residents of several cities reported a shaking of the building that took several seconds.
The last such earthquake was last recorded in Bosnia and Herzegovina in Zenica in 2012, when it reached a magnitude of 4.9, the portal klix.ba reports.
The earthquake was also felt in much of neighboring Croatia from Slavonski Brod, Vinkovci to Karlovac and all the way to Dubrovnik, according to the Croatian Seismological Service. There is no information on possible damage, Croatian news agency Hina reports.
